cnbc.title: Potential Trump tariff refund bill could top $1 trillion as Supreme Court fight looms
cnbc.summary: The Supreme Court has not indicated when it might rule on a request by the Trump administration to rule quickly on whether many new tariffs are legal.

cnbc.title: Ex-Meta employee files whistleblower suit for alleged security flaws at WhatsApp
cnbc.summary: A former Meta employee sued the company over allegations that its WhatsApp service contained cybersecurity failures that could compromise user privacy.

cnbc.title: What to know about the Hyundai-LG plant immigration raid in Georgia
cnbc.summary: Federal and immigration agents conducted a massive raid on a Hyundai facility in Ellabell, Georgia, last week, arresting 475 people.

cnbc.title: Trump Epstein letter and drawing from 'birthday book' released
cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump sued The Wall Street Journal for defamation over its report revealing the existence of the letter to Jeffrey Epstein.

cnbc.title: Nebius' stock soars 60% on multibillion-dollar AI infrastructure deal with Microsoft
cnbc.summary: Nebius said it signed a multibillion-dollar agreement to provide Microsoft with artificial intelligence infrastructure.

cnbc.title: Trump loses bid to overturn $83.3 million judgment in E. Jean Carroll defamation case
cnbc.summary: Carroll has accused Trump of defaming her in statements denying her accusation that he raped her decades earlier in a New York City department store.

cnbc.title: Here's how to get a better mortgage rate as the 30-year fixed nears a 1-year low
cnbc.summary: A lot of would-be buyers feel priced out of the housing market. Getting a lower mortgage rate might help move the needle.

cnbc.title: Trump raised the SALT deduction cap to $40,000: Here's what it means for taxpayers
cnbc.summary: The $40,000 cap on state and local tax deductions provides relief to families who face surging property taxes but adds to the national debt.

cnbc.title: Traders see a chance the Fed cuts by a half point
cnbc.summary: Traders are leaving open the option that the Federal Reserve next week could cut its key interest rate by half a percentage point.

cnbc.title: Cognition valued at $10.2 billion two months after Windsurf purchase
cnbc.summary: Two months after buying AI coding startup Windsurf, Cognition is being valued by investors at more than $10 billion.
